sait.frms.manager

Class ReservationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.frms.manager.ReservationManager

  • public class ReservationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class description: This class is for reservation manager to read and write reservation information to the random file. and deal with updating information of a certain reservation such as change name, citizen or set status to inactive or active

      • makeReservation

        public Reservation makeReservation(Flight flight,
                                   java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String citizenship)
                            throws NoSeatException,
                                   InvalidCitizenException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        makeReservation this is for making reservation
        Parameters:
        flight - the flight to be booked
        name - the name of the customer
        citizenship - the citizenship of the customer
        Returns:
        a reservation object
        Throws:
        NoSeatException - if available seat is zero then throw an exception
        InvalidCitizenException - if the citizenship input is null then throw an exception
        java.io.IOException - if the file is not found when saving information to the random access file.
